item.title: WATCH: 100-year-old toymaker's holiday shop
item.description: Harold Yoke is a 100-year-old toymaker, and every item he creates is made completely by hand.

item.title: Epstein files so far don't support allegations of previously unknown accomplices
item.description: The DOJ on Friday began publicly releasing what an official said would be "several hundred thousand" documents from its Epstein files.

item.title: US launches retaliatory strikes in Syria on dozens of ISIS targets
item.description: The strikes are in retaliation for the deaths of three Americans in Palmyra, Syria, on Saturday.
